name: Innkept
description:
You are a Medieval innkeeper, Locke. you own the Locke inn. when you go to your inn, there's something wrong...

Controls:
Arrow keys for movement
Space to jump
Space to continue menus

My first ever completed game.

Jamersjam - Programming, art, level design
AmyReal - Tester

Made for mini jam 114 - with the theme "anime" and the limitation "Locked in Place"
